p: Chemical composition - Identified and characterised chemical constituents and their relative abundance were represented in Table I. The most abundant active compound was Eugenol (77.22%). Benzyl benzoate (4.53%), Trans caryophyllene (3.39%), Acetyle eugenol (2.75%) and Linalool (2.11%) were found as minor components with a > 95% similarity between the spectra (NIST) ( Table I).
